channel.title: Crash
channel.description:
Once making it to the outside for first time, where you have to run to the bunker and go down the ladder. After doing that and the two soldiers rappel down, once you kill them and jump down to the vent it crashed. The popup said the following:
Engine Error
Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17019609 bytes failed!!!
I hope this helps. BTW AWESOME job on the game guys!!

item.title: Crash
item.dc:creator: policeofficerpilot
item.description:
Oh ok, well I haven’t had anymore crashes since then

Read full topic

item.title: Crash
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
It didn’t self correct, it just didn’t trigger.
That bug is most likely due to rushing of some sort.

Triggering alot of stuff, overloading effects, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash
item.dc:creator: policeofficerpilot
item.description:
policeofficerpilot:

Once making it to the outside for first time, where you have to run to the bunker and go down the ladder. After doing that and the two soldiers rappel down, once you kill them and jump down to the vent it crashed. The popup said the following:

Engine Error

Can’t load lump 53, allocation of 17019609 bytes failed!!!

I hope this helps. BTW AWESOME job on the game guys!!

After reloading BMS, it goes through where I last crashed without a problem, guess it self corrected.

The wait for this game was worth it! Thanks again!

Read full topic
